.replace(/纖細/g, '纤细')
.replace(/輕/g, '轻')
.replace(/鬆/g, '松')

.replace(/溫/g, '温')
.replace(/懸/g, '悬')

.replace(/勵/g, '励')
.replace(/宮/g, '宫')
.replace(/會/g, '会')

ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
result.replace(/[\S\s]+Scripts.*\s*/, '')
.replace(/([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※([\s\S]*?)※※※※※※※※※※※※※/g, '$2$1')
.replace(/[\S\s]*?※※※※※※※※※※※※※/, '收费章节，请付费后阅读。\n')
.replace(/作家想說的話/, '作者有话说')
.replace(/彩蛋內容：/, '【彩蛋内容：】')
.replace(/\s*留言送出完成。/, '')
.replace(/下方留下評論後可完成敲蛋!/, '')
.replace(/\s*信息加載中.../, '');
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

//一行个数

"腹肌::腹肌::4::a",
"快穿::快穿::4::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://www.haitangsoushu.com/s/'+url+'/{{page}}/':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//账号注册
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	let password = result.get("密码");
	let checkCode = result.get("邮箱验证码");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}
//获取验证码
function getVerificationCode() {
	let loginName = result.get("邮箱");
	if (loginName) {
		let body = `email=${loginName}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/sendCheckCode';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responeBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responeBody.msg) {
			java.toast(responeBody.msg);
			java.log(responeBody.msg);
		}
	}
}

function searchExcludeTags() {
	let excludeTags = this.getExcludeTags();
	//java.log(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
	java.longToast(`当前标签屏蔽：${excludeTags}`);
}

function resetExcludeTags() {
	let data = getData();
	data.ExcludeTags = [];
	setData(data);
	//java.log("标签屏蔽已重置");
	java.toast("标签屏蔽已重置");
}

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {
		data.ExcludeTags.push(tag);
	} else {
		data.ExcludeTags.splice(index, 1);
	}
	//java.log(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	java.toast(`标签 ${tag} 已${index == -1 ? "添加": "移除" }屏蔽`);
	setData(data);
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
可以无脑获取搜索地址哦，大家可以试试。
‼️先填入正确的Url再试‼️
searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>
